name: 闪客快打8武装行
description:
There are various copies, missions, a large number of equipment, weapons, ammunition, cold weapons, professions, skills, various monsters, and bosses.
Compared to previous my games, the biggest difference in this game is the first use of real-time online cooperative combat mode for clearing levels. Players can play solo or form teams, add friends with other online players, and chat. Teams of up to 4 people can fight and clear levels simultaneously. In team mode, the battle process, round-trip missions, mid-way supplies, NPC trading, item sorting, equipment use, vehicle driving, etc., are all real-time online.

In addition, this game has abolished the previous pay-to-win system and now uses K points obtained in the game. K points can be obtained through leveling up and settling accounts after clearing copies, with higher levels yielding more points, especially in later copies.

Everything else remains the same recipe and taste, so if you like it, give it a thumbs up!

Primer:
The world has been threatened by the end of the world, comets hit the earth, new infectious diseases, nuclear wars, zombie crises, world wars, alien invasions, etc... Human beings use their wisdom, science, and faith to overcome disasters time and time again. ...
On December 21, 20XX, the earth's magnetic pole reversal triggered a global earthquake, and most of the human buildings were destroyed. The tsunami caused by the earthquake would not have killed almost all human beings, but the carbon emissions accumulated over hundreds of years, The resulting greenhouse effect led to global warming. The glaciers in the Arctic and Antarctic finally melted, and human beings finally tasted the bitter fruit they brewed... The largest tsunami in history swept across all continents, and even the roof of the world, the Himalayas, was washed away by the tsunami...
That day we came to call Judgment Day.
The world has once again entered chaos.
The wheel of history continues...
----------Basic operation
--- button
This game requires keyboard and mouse.
Character Control:
The key AD is to move left and right, and the key S is to squat.
The key W is the extreme speed mode, which consumes energy.
The space bar is to jump, and the space bar is pressed to skip during the dialogue.
Key 1 is empty-handed mode, key 2 switches to cold weapon, key 3 switches to auxiliary weapon, key 4 switches to main weapon, and key ~ is for cycle switching. If the relevant weapon is not equipped, the switching will fail.
In empty hand and cold weapon mode, key J is attack. When using firearms, the mouse controls the aiming, clicks the mouse to control the shooting, and the key R is for reloading.
Key 5 is to switch props, such as food, potion, grenade, etc. Key Q is to use props.
Key E is survey, upload and download tools.

Vehicle Control:
Key E is survey, upload and download tools.
The key AD is to move left and right and consume fuel.
The key W is the extreme speed mode, and the fuel consumption increases.
When carrying a weapon, the mouse controls the shooting and consumes the corresponding magazine in the trunk.

Key setting:
The setting button in the lower right corner of the game screen opens the setting interface, selects the button pager card, and performs button settings.
